title: Needs Analysis-Based Instructional Design for Training Phonics Pedagogy Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational English education theories and basic knowledge of elementary English curricula
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining digital online instruction and offline workshops, focusing on phonics pedagogy aligned with national English curricula

learning_goals: Learners can design a systematic instructional plan applying seven phonics knowledge dimensions (e.g., phonological awareness, decoding rules, pedagogy)
Learners can analyze phonics-related requirements of the national English curriculum and incorporate them into actual lesson design
Learners can develop a blended phonics instructional model combining digital tools with traditional teaching methods
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
